body_html: This will break the Windows build and is not exception safe. We should use std::mutex from C++11 instead of pthread mutexes. That will probably require changing at least THTensorRandom.c to C++.
body_text: This will break the Windows build and is not exception safe. We should use std::mutex from C++11 instead of pthread mutexes. That will probably require changing at least THTensorRandom.c to C++.
body: This will break the Windows build and is not exception safe. We should use `std::mutex` from C++11 instead of pthread mutexes. That will probably require changing at least `THTensorRandom.c` to C++.
